allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Initial implementation of FastMovieMaker

Video subtitle editor with Whisper-based automatic subtitle generation.
- Video playback \(QGraphicsView + QMediaPlayer\)
- Subtitle overlay, timeline, and subtitle panel
- Whisper transcription backend with background threading
- SRT export, unit tests

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash("E:/Python/Scripts/ffmpeg.exe" -f lavfi -i testsrc=duration=10:size=1280x720:rate=30 -f lavfi -i sine=frequency=440:duration=10 -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -pix_fmt yuv420p -y "H:/MyProject/FastMovieMaker/tests/test_video.mp4")

Bash("H:/MyProject/FastMovieMaker/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sys, os
os.environ[''QT_DEBUG_PLUGINS''] = ''1''
os.environ[''QT_LOGGING_RULES''] = ''*.debug=true;qt.multimedia.*=true''
from PySide6.QtWidgets import QApplication
from PySide6.QtMultimedia import QMediaPlayer, QAudioOutput
from PySide6.QtCore import QUrl, QTimer

app = QApplication\(sys.argv\)
player = QMediaPlayer\(\)
audio = QAudioOutput\(\)
player.setAudioOutput\(audio\)

url = QUrl.fromLocalFile\(''H:/MyProject/FastMovieMaker/tests/test_video.mp4''\)
player.setSource\(url\)
player.play\(\)

QTimer.singleShot\(3000, lambda: [
    print\(f''state={player.playbackState\(\)}, status={player.mediaStatus\(\)}, error={player.errorString\(\)}''\),
    app.quit\(\)
]\)
app.exec\(\)
")

Bash(git -C /Users/namhyunjun/MyProject/FastMovieMaker commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TTS playhead drag: seek now works correctly without video

- Fix _on_timeline_seek to directly seek TTS player when no video loaded
  \(was using _player.position\(\)=0, resetting TTS to 0ms on every seek\)
- Fix _seek_to_x to update playhead position immediately so it follows
  mouse drag visually
- Remove temporary test scripts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
